title: ABN: the library without walls (TEFC)
creator_credit: Canberra Media Productions and National Library of Australia
brief_description: An introduction to the Australian Bibliographic Network to non-librarians, and to librarians who have little knowledge of A.B.N. An introduction for courses either specifically on A.B.N. or on general on line services
